description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Educational_Institution_CourseObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

description: The Web Service Element holding Educational Institution Course Data

validation.validation: The Course ID already exists for the Educational Institution Catalog. Please input a Course ID that is unique.
One or more of the submitted academic areas are inactive. Remove the inactive academic areas.
One or more of the submitted course designations are inactive. Remove the inactive course designations.
Specify a related course that is different than the current Educational Institution Course.
Specify a related course from the same Educational Institution as the current Educational Institution Course.
